ALL HAVE BEEN SOLD!  Thanks Mike!
For sale are seven t206s that are graded SGC 40/3.  The cards and prices are as follows:
1) Al Orth (SL) $80
2) Hal Chase (Trophy) PB Back $65
3) Buck Herzog (New York) $33
4) Buck Herzog (Boston) $33
5) George Brown (Chicago) $35
6) Monte Cross $33
7) Dode Paskert $33
I will provide scans upon request.  Price includes delivery.  Please pay by check, Money order, or paypal gift.  Thanks!  Let me know if you have questions.
Jim
